com.gwtplatform.mvp.client.proxy

Interface Gatekeeper

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GatekeeperWithParams
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoggedInGatekeeper

    public interface Gatekeeper
    Inherit from this class to define a gatekeeper that locks access to your Place in specific situation. For example: 

     public class AdminGatekeeper implements Gatekeeper {

   private final CurrentUser currentUser;

  @Inject
   public AdminGatekeeper( CurrentUser currentUser ) {
     this.currentUser = currentUser;
   }

  @Override
   public boolean canReveal() {
     return currentUser.isAdministrator();
   }

 }

    You must also make sure that your custom Ginjector provides a get method returning this Gatekeeper if you want to use it with the UseGatekeeper annotation.

    You should usually bind your Gatekeeper as a singleton.

    Author:
    Philippe Beaudoin, Olivier Monaco

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canReveal()
      Checks whether or not the Place controlled by this gatekeeper can be revealed.

    • Method Detail

      • canReveal

        boolean canReveal()
        Checks whether or not the Place controlled by this gatekeeper can be revealed.
        Returns:
        true if the Place can be revealed, false otherwise.
